name: Despair: The World Is Gonna Roll You
name_original: Despair: The World Is Gonna Roll You
description:
DESPAIR: THE WORLD IS GONNA ROLL YOU

A playable editorial cartoon created for #gamesvsnazis.

Somebody once told me you could click on enemies to punch them.

Wait for your PUNCH METER to fill up to unleash a MEGA PUNCH.

Pace yourself. The world is gonna roll you.
